actions.text: On agreeing to the Pappas amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 139 - 285 (Roll No. 330).

description: Amendment sought to transfer $50 million to the Land and Water Conservation Fund Stateside Grant Program and reduce funding for the National Endowment for the Arts by $50 million.
purpose: An amendment to increase the State side grant program of the land and water conservation fund by $50 million.
